name: ELSE
description:
2013 Game Prototype inspired by The Zone in Roadside Picnic by Boris and Arkadi Strugatzki and Stalker by Andrei Tarkovsky.


!!!
Mac Only: The Unity project vanished in The Zone and only this old Mac Build could be recovered. Sorry.
!!!

If you don't have a Mac, please have a look at the playthrough video on this page instead :(
